text: Government announces PM-KISAN scheme to provide ₹6,000 annual income support to farmers.
The Union Cabinet approves National Education Policy 2020 to reform school and higher education.
The Ministry of Power launches the Saubhagya scheme to achieve universal household electrification.
Digital India initiative expands broadband access to rural areas under BharatNet project.
Ayushman Bharat provides free health insurance up to ₹5 lakh per family per year for eligible households.
Government announces reduction in corporate tax rate to 22 percent to boost economic growth.
Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana aims to provide affordable housing to all by 2024.
The Union Government launches PM Gati Shakti National Master Plan for integrated infrastructure development.
India achieves 100 percent village electrification under Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Gram Jyoti Yojana.
Jal Jeevan Mission launched to provide safe and adequate drinking water to every rural household by 2024.
The Union Budget 2023 introduces new income tax regime with revised slabs and lower rates.
PM Ujjwala Yojana provides free LPG connections to women from below poverty line households.
National Clean Air Programme launched to reduce air pollution levels by 20-30 percent by 2024.
Government of India announces new FDI policy reforms to attract foreign investment.
Atmanirbhar Bharat Abhiyan launched to make India self-reliant across sectors.
Swachh Bharat Mission successfully eliminates open defecation in rural India.
Smart Cities Mission aims to develop 100 smart cities across India.
The Ministry of Health launches COVID-19 vaccination drive across India.
National Green Hydrogen Mission announced to make India a hub for green energy.
Make in India initiative promotes domestic manufacturing and job creation.
Beti Bachao Beti Padhao launched to promote education and empowerment of the girl child.
PM Jan Dhan Yojana enables financial inclusion through zero balance bank accounts.
Startup India initiative fosters innovation and entrepreneurship among youth.
UDAN scheme launched to improve regional air connectivity under civil aviation.
Rural electrification achieved in all states as per government data in 2018.
The Government of India launches Digital Health Mission for integrated healthcare records.
Mission Karmayogi launched for capacity building of civil servants.
Production Linked Incentive scheme launched for 14 key sectors to boost manufacturing.
PLI scheme extended to drone manufacturing to encourage innovation.
Government launches eShram portal for unorganized workers registration.
